sentence.Network_en: There has always been a difference between community radio and commercial radio.
sentence.Network_cn: 社区广播电台和商业广播电台一直是有区别的。

sentence.Network_en: All this, needless to say, had been culled second-hand from radio reports.
sentence.Network_cn: 不用说，所有这些都是从电台报道中采集来的二手材料。

sentence.Network_en: I use the short-wave radio to get the latest war news.
sentence.Network_cn: 我用短波收音机收听最新的战事新闻。
